channel.title: Age of Ravens: History of Superhero RPGs (1978-1982)
channel.description:
Continuing my look back at my history of RPG Genre lists, I revisit Superheroes, a genre near and dear to my heart. When I started this series, I thought I had a decent handle on the games out there, but every installment surprised me with something new. The Gauntlet Hangouts initiative, [Gauntlet Comics](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-comics-101), has embraced many different superhero rpgs as well as non-supes adapted for a superhuman universe.
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/aor-superhero-rpgs-part-one-1978-1982 ![pic542680_md|361x500](upload://begi1dbUWX00ZZqYgs16s0Yx6fo.jpeg)
